meta.name: GraphON Soft Dashboard (Pastel) Design System
meta.intent: High-level design guidance + tokens + component recipes to replicate the same look consistently in this project.
notes: Style keywords: soft, airy, pastel, rounded, friendly, premium-lite, minimal borders, subtle depth, playful illustrations.
Primary interaction pattern: card-based dashboard with pill controls and compact icon buttons.

principle: Use a strict 4px grid; most spacing should be multiples of 4.
Prefer generous whitespace; avoid cramped layouts.
Use stacked sections with clear visual grouping via backgrounds instead of borders.

fontFamilies.ui: var(--font-inter), Inter, system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Arial, sans-serif
fontFamilies.displayOptional: var(--font-poppins), Poppins, var(--font-inter), Inter, system-ui, sans-serif
fontFamilies.mono: ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, 'Liberation Mono', 'Courier New', monospace

principle: Headings are bold and compact; body text is readable but not heavy.
Prefer short labels; use captions for metadata.
Avoid all-caps for long strings; use small uppercase only for tiny section labels.
The reference uses generous rounding everywhere.

colors.model: Use existing GraphON CSS variables as the base, extend with pastels for surfaces.
usageRules: Avoid visible borders. Use low-opacity tints or surface contrast to separate elements.
Primary actions use brand color; secondary actions use tinted surfaces.
Cards use white surface; inner blocks use pastel surfaces for grouping.

shadowsAndDepth.shadowStyle: No shadows. Use layered surfaces + pastel fills for hierarchy.
principle: Prefer depth via layered surfaces (cards within cards) and gentle pastel backgrounds.
Micro-interactions should feel soft and bouncy (small scale/translate), not dramatic.
Use motion to communicate state changes (selected, pressed, opened).

separation: Prefer spacing + background tint over borders.
Dividers (if needed): 1px line with ~8–12% opacity of primary RGB.

iconography.style: Outline icons with rounded ends; place in circular containers for emphasis.

principles: Keep top bar visually light; no borders; minimal text.
Use cards as primary layout units.
Inside cards, use pastel blocks to group content and create hierarchy.

StatsCard.layout: 2-up grid on mobile (two cards side-by-side), each with icon circle + big number + label
StatsCard.bg: Use pastel surface per card category (mint/peach/butter).
principles: Numbers are the hero; labels stay subtle.

SearchInput.icon: Leading search icon in muted tone
principles: Focus state is a slightly stronger tint; avoid glow.
Tabs should look like soft chips, not navigation bars.
Buttons are bold but friendly; prefer pills.
Avoid borders; rely on filled backgrounds.

ListRow.shape: Rounded row inside a soft gradient/tint
principles: Rows should feel like mini-cards: soft, touch-friendly, no lines.

ModalSheet.style: Rounded sheet with soft surface, minimal overlay, no heavy shadow.
principles: Keep sheet content airy; group actions into pill buttons.

do: Use pastel surfaces for grouping and hierarchy.
Use pill shapes for interactive controls.
Keep typography bold for headings, calm for body.
Prefer large corner radii and generous spacing.
Make touch targets at least 40px tall.
dont: Don’t use strong borders or heavy drop shadows.
Don’t overuse gradients—reserve them for subtle row backgrounds or accents.
Don’t cram multiple actions; prefer one primary and one secondary per row.
accessibility: Maintain readable contrast for text on pastel backgrounds (prefer ink colors).
Always provide focus-visible styles (outline via background tint, not glow).

cssVariables.recommendation: Prefer rgba(var(--color-primary-rgb), alpha) for soft tints; avoid borders unless opacity <= 0.12.

componentPatterns: Wrap sections in a white card surface; use inner pastel blocks for highlights.
Use 'PillTabs' rail for switching states instead of classic tabs with underlines.
Buttons: pill; primary filled; secondary tinted; avoid outlines.
Lists: gradient/tinted rows with avatar + name + actions aligned right.
